trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The determined naturalist has a small, furry problem for you to solve.
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the vocal varmint and have the pair accompany you.
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the determined naturalist while accompanied by the vocal varmint and its companion.

TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_SCHOLAR05025_000_001<tab>Well, I never... To think I'd run into you in Tuliyollal of all places. I'm from the Studium's Faculty of Biology. I've seen you before, back in Old Sharlayan!

TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_SCHOLAR05025_000_002<tab>Ah, that reminds me. You'll have to forgive the impertinence, but there just so happens to be a matter I could use your help with... I'm researching Turali ecosystems, and I'm currently on the hunt for one creature in particular.
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_SCHOLAR05025_000_003<tab>In truth, I'd barely set foot on land before I made my discovery. Alas, as I was trying to secure the specimen for study, it got away from me...

TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_SCHOLAR05025_000_004<tab>It has a somewhat...peculiar cry, to say the least. The creature itself is covered in tawny brown fur and is rather small in stature. The strangest thing is, I asked some of the locals whether they had heard of such an animal, and they seemed quite baffled!
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_SCHOLAR05025_000_005<tab>You don't happen to know of the creature I speak of, do you?
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_A1_000_001<tab>I daren't speak of such a vicious beast.
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_A1_000_002<tab>Sounds like a giant beaver to me.
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_A1_000_003<tab>I'm just as baffled as the locals. Never heard of such a creature.
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_A1_000_004<tab>Squeal! Squeeeal!
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_SCHOLAR05025_000_006<tab>You've laid eyes on the creature!? And a valiant hero such as yourself is in awe of its ferocity? Why, I must get my hands on it at all costs!
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_SCHOLAR05025_000_007<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Giant<var 1A 01 /var>, you say!? I should very much like to behold such grandeur with my own eyes!

TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_SCHOLAR05025_000_008<tab>It's surprising that one so well traveled would not have come across the creature. Which suggests that it is indeed a rare specimen of the highest order─and thus science demands it be captured and studied!

TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_SCHOLAR05025_000_009<tab>Aha! You mean to discern the animal's habitat and mannerisms by imitating its cry? Quite remarkable. It seems I'm in the presence of a budding naturalist! Well, I shan't be outshone in my own field! The creature must be captured!

TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_SCHOLAR05025_000_010<tab>I shall conduct an extensive search of the port, which is where I first saw the creature. Might I ask you to search the high ground─the residential district known as the Resplendent Quarter?
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_SCHOLAR05025_000_011<tab>I shall continue my search in the vicinity. Now that I think of it, the creature itself may have come here from foreign shores...
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_BEAVER05025_000_021<tab><squeal>?
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>The vocal varmint and its companion seem willing to follow you. Lead the pair back to the determined naturalist at High Tide Harbor.
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_SYSTEM_000_023<tab>The vocal varmint and its companion are now accompanying you. Keep them at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_SYSTEM_000_024<tab>You can leave your quest companions behind by entering a different area, or by speaking with them and selecting the option to part ways.
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_SYSTEM_000_025<tab>If you wish to have your companions join you again, return and speak with them at the original location.
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>You must be accompanied by the vocal varmint and its companion, and have them at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>Your companions have yet to arrive. Be sure they are at your side before attempting to continue.
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_A2_000_001<tab>Small talk.
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_A2_000_002<tab>Part ways.
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_A2_000_003<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_BEAVER05025_000_033<tab><squeal> <squeeeaaal>!
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_SYSTEM_000_034<tab>Are you sure you wish to part ways with your companions?
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_BEAVER05025_000_035<tab><squeal> <squeal>!
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_SYSTEM_000_036<tab>The vocal varmint and its companion seem willing to wait for you in the Resplendent Quarter. Return to them when you are ready.
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_BEAVER05025_000_037<tab><squeal>!
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_SYSTEM_000_038<tab>Having patiently waited for your return, the vocal varmint and its companion seem eager to follow you once again.

TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_SCHOLAR05025_000_039<tab>B-Brilliant, simply brilliant! Not one, but <var 1A 02 /var>two<var 1A 01 /var>! I only spotted a single specimen earlier─little did I think there'd be another lurking nearby!
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_BEAVER05025_000_040<tab><squeal> <squeal> <squeal>!

TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_SCHOLAR05025_000_041<tab>They both seem remarkably docile. What a marvelous stroke of luck to be reunited with my quarry so quickly. This rather vindicates my decision to travel all this way!
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_SCHOLAR05025_000_042<tab>You see, our professor recently absconded, leaving me and my fellow researchers vying for the newly vacated position.

TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_SCHOLAR05025_000_043<tab>This is just what I need! If I can work this discovery into a paper, it will do wonders for my standing within the faculty─and put me one step closer to that tenured position!

TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_SCHOLAR05025_000_044<tab>Recently, my fellow researchers and I have been vying for a tenured position within the faculty. This discovery is exactly what I need to give me the upper hand during the selection process!
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_SCHOLAR05025_000_045<tab>Suffice it to say, I'll be keeping a close eye on these two and tending to them with the utmost care. I can't wait to conduct a thorough study!
TEXT_KINGZA009_05025_BEAVER05025_000_046<tab><squeal> <squeeeaaal>!
